text:
Validation Act 2023

An Act to amend the Coroners Act 1995 and the Legal Profession Act 2007
[Royal Assent 23 June 2023]

Be it enacted by Her Excellency the Governor of Tasmania, by and with the advice and consent of the Legislative Council and House of Assembly, in Parliament assembled, as follows:

PART 1 - Preliminary

1. Short title
    This Act may be cited as the Validation Act 2023 .

2. Commencement
    This Act commences on the day on which this Act receives the Royal Assent.

3. Repeal of Act
    This Act is repealed on the first anniversary of the day on which it commenced.

PART 2 - Coroners Act 1995 Amended

4.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Coroners Act 1995 .

5.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Coroners Act 1995 .

PART 3 - Legal Profession Act 2007 Amended

6.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Legal Profession Act 2007 .

7.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Legal Profession Act 2007 .
